tool_description: SendHub is the easy way to send one text message to everyone. With the SendHub API you can make it easy for your app, and your users to do the same.
name: SendHub
title: SendHub

api_list.name: Collect a Group’s Contacts

required_parameters.name: id
required_parameters.description: ID - is the group’s id. This can be obtained from the id or resource_uri field.

api_list.name: Get Message
View Threads

required_parameters.name: threadid
required_parameters.description: Where THREADID (and the full path) is obtained from the ‘resource_uri’ value in the Inbox response.

api_list.name: Collect a Single Group’s Data

required_parameters.name: id
required_parameters.description: ID - is the group’s id. This can be obtained from the id or resource_uri field.

api_list.name: Collecting the Profile
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://sendhub.p.rapidapi.com/profile/"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "sendhub.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
